apiDescription: For documentation about this API, please visit https://developer.paylocity.com/integrations/reference/weblink-overview
metaDescription: Paylocity is the HR & Payroll provider that frees you from the tasks of today, so together, we can spend more time focused on the promise of tomorrow.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description:
The Paylocity Company Identifier. This is the unique value provided by Paylocity to each specific Payroll Entity.
                **Allowable Values:**
                9 char max

parameters.name: employeeId
parameters.description:
The Paylocity Employee ID. This is a unique value per Paylocity Company ID.
**Allowable Values:**
10 char max

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Number of records per page. Default value is 25.

parameters.name: pagenumber
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve; page numbers are 0-based (so to get the first page of results, pass pagenumber=0). Default value is 0.

parameters.name: includetotalcount
parameters.description: Whether to include the total record count in the header's X-Pcty-Total-Count property. Default value is true.

methods.description: Get employee pay statement details data for the specified year and check date.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description:
The Paylocity Company Identifier. This is the unique value provided by Paylocity to each specific Payroll Entity.
                **Allowable Values:**
                9 char max

parameters.name: employeeId
parameters.description:
The Paylocity Employee ID. This is a unique value per Paylocity Company ID.
**Allowable Values:**
10 char max

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year for which to retrieve pay statement data

parameters.name: checkDate
parameters.description: The check date for which to retrieve pay statement data

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Number of records per page. Default value is 25.

parameters.name: pagenumber
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve; page numbers are 0-based (so to get the first page of results, pass pagenumber=0). Default value is 0.

parameters.name: includetotalcount
parameters.description: Whether to include the total record count in the header's X-Pcty-Total-Count property. Default value is true.

parameters.name: codegroup
parameters.description: Retrieve pay statement details related to specific deduction, earning or tax types. Common values include 401k, Memo, Reg, OT, Cash Tips, FED and SITW.

repositoryDescription: Paylocity is the HR & Payroll provider that frees you from the tasks of today, so together, we can spend more time focused on the promise of tomorrow. Paylocity's {language} SDK for Weblink API generated by Konfig (https://konfigthis.com/).
